txt.en: Igash the Fanatic proclaims, 'We are betrayed! Defend yourselves, my brethren!'
'You have no place in Moria. I will splatter your guts on the floors and colour my boots with your blood!'
'For their tribute, I shall draw their strength and paint the walls with your innards! Die!'
This chest can only be opened when Igash is slain.
Igash the Fanatic bellows, 'Keep an eye on those White Hand Orcs...I smell a rat in our midst.'
Igash the Fanatic bellows, 'Watch the White Hand closely, my Devoted. I see mutiny in their eyes!'
